Package org.opentcs.access

Interfaces and classes for accessing the kernel from outside, for instance from a remote client or a communication adapter.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Kernel
    Declares the methods an openTCS kernel implements.
    KernelServicePortal
    Provides clients access to kernel services.
    LocalKernel
    Declares the methods the openTCS kernel must provide which are not accessible to remote peers.
    SharedKernelClient Deprecated
    Use SharedKernelServicePortal instead.
    SharedKernelProvider Deprecated
    Use SharedKernelServicePortalProvider instead.
    SharedKernelServicePortal
    Provides access to a shared KernelServicePortal instance.
    SharedKernelServicePortalProvider
    Pools access to a KernelServicePortal instance for multiple clients.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationItemTO Deprecated
    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.
    KernelStateTransitionEvent
    Emitted by/for kernel state changes.
    ModelTransitionEvent
    Emitted when the kernel loads a model.
    NotificationPublicationEvent
    Instances of this class represent events emitted by/for notifications being published.
    SchedulerAllocationState
    Represents the current state of resource allocations.
    SslParameterSet
    A set of parameters to be used for SSL-encrypted socket connections.
    TCSKernelStateEvent Deprecated
    Use KernelStateTransitionEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    TCSModelTransitionEvent Deprecated
    Use ModelTransitionEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    TCSNotificationEvent Deprecated
    Use NotificationPublicationEvent instead, which does not extend TCSEvent.
    TravelCosts Deprecated
    Providing travel costs to external clients will not be part of the standard kernel API any more.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Kernel.State
    The various states a kernel instance may be running in.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CredentialsException
    Thrown when there are insufficient user permissions to perform an operation.
    KernelException
    An exception thrown by the openTCS kernel.
    KernelRuntimeException
    A runtime exception thrown by the openTCS kernel.
    UnsupportedKernelOpException Deprecated
    Not required any more.

Package org.opentcs.access Description

Interfaces and classes for accessing the kernel from outside, for instance from a remote client or a communication adapter.
